channel.title: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?
channel.description: Well... I oddly haven't been able to find a tutorial or anything really to help me make a safe zone... If you could give me a link to help me or maybe give me some step-by-step instructions i could try and use i would be greatly appreciated! :)

item.title: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

also need to declare safezone if it isn’t declared yet[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 04:04:26 pm[/size][hr]oh shit my bad i thought you were talking about funzone!!! hahaha sooo sorry yeah all you do for safezone is search public boolean nonwild( or something like that

and add the coords

it looks like this

public boolean nonWild()

and under that…

|| (absX >= xx11 && xx22 <= 2874 && absY >= yy22 && absY <= yy11) || (absX >= xx11 && absX <= xx22 && absY >= yy22 && absY <= yy11) || (absX >= xx11 && absX <= xx22 && absY >= yy22 && absY <= yy11)

the xx11 and yy11’s and stuff are where you put your coords

you do i think it is north east corner and south west corner that you want to be safe

its either north east and south west or north west and south east

north x and y coords go in xx11 and yy11

south go in xx22 and yy22

just change the coords to your coords

Read full topic

item.source: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?

item.title: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Well if you’re wanting to make a new safe zone then you’re going to want to add a new || statment so it will look like this :

public boolean nonWildPvP() {
if (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3204 && absY >= 3226 && absY <= 3218) || (coordX >= 3240 && coordX <= 3246 && coordY >= 3097 && coordY <= 3088)

Just change the x and y coords.

A good way to figure it out is on you’re server type ::tele and look at the examples, and see where the x starts and finishes, same with Y.

Sorry if I didn’t explain it well, but going to sleep now.

It’s really simple anyway, so good luck. P.S if you get any compiler errors you’re probs missing a ) somewhere

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?

item.title: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Brennan_The_Great Brennan The Great
item.description:
@Brennan_The_Great wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:4, topic:297521”]Nah there’s no way you can go wrong.

It should come up with something like this, even if you change the co-ords wrong you wont get a compiler error.

public boolean nonWildPvP() { if (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3204 && absY >= 3226 && absY <= 3218)[/quote]

Yeah! That’s what i got… Could you try explaining what to change there? I think i can figure it out, but I don’t wanna fuck up lol.

I’ll backup mah client.java

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a "safe zone" into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Search for something like…

nonwild

or nonwildy

or nonpvp

or anything like that in client.java, then just change / make your own coords using ||
